extendedInfo.description: Area Calculator is a fully featured calculator which provides calculation of the Area. Calculate various properties of Area related values using this simple utility tool. Area Calculator includes the following features:1.	Square Calculator2.	Rectangle Calculator3.	Triangle Calculator4.	Rhombus Calculator5.	Trapezium Calculator6.	Polygon Calculator7.	Kite Calculator8.	Prism Calculator9.	Pyramid Calculator10.	Circle Calculator11.	Cone Calculator12.	Cube Calculator13.	Cylinder Calculator14.	Ellipse Calculator15.	Sphere Calculator16.	Hemisphere Calculator17.	Aspect Ratio Calculator18.	Barell Volume Calculator19.	Pipe Volume Calculator20.	Rectangular to Polar conversion21.	Hemispherical Cylinder Volume Calculator 22.	Octagonal Pyramid Volume Calculator
